-R5tO7eajsY.title: Tumblr provides access to previous TOS and privacy policy

tosdr.tldr: They provide transparency on how the current policies differ from earlier versions, and when they changed.

05XCfURjPsg.title: Tumblr has provisions for users outside the US

tosdr.case: court of law is in location X
tosdr.tldr: Your data is stored in the US, and people from a country embargoed by the United States cannot use premium themes.
Tumblr places third-party cookies such as Google Analytics and Quantcast, whose behavior is not subject to their Privacy Policy.

1WKEDu7pH70.title: Third parties used by Tumblr are bound by confidentiality obligations

tosdr.case: third parties are bound by confidentiality obligations
tosdr.tldr: Third parties that assist Tumblr are generally bound by confidentiality obligations that forbid them to use your personal information for other purposes.

3jL7bhVbaag.title: Tumblr get a limited but eternal copyright license on your creations

tosdr.case: keep a license even after you close your account
tosdr.tldr: When you post something on Tumblr, others may choose to comment on it, making your content part of a social conversation in which Tumblr will never have to erase your original post, not even if you close your account.

meta.author: Hugo for “Terms of Service; Didn't Read”
meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA

any-time-with-notice.title: Terms may be changed at any time, but you will be notified.

tosdr.case: user is notified on the day
tosdr.tldr: They can change the terms of service any time they see fit, but they will notify the user. Your use of the service supposedly constitutes acceptance of the changes in the terms.

q-fT5DcxfF8.title: You maintain ownership of your Tumblr content

tosdr.case: they state that you own your data
tosdr.tldr: Users maintain ownership of any content on their Tumblr. This is important because of the reblogging nature of Tumblr. Your content can be shared across numerous pages, but you will always own it.
